sys_openapi_operation.name: Sets an asset's provided links according to a specific link type.
sys_openapi_operation.serialized_operation:
{"fName":"Sets an asset's provided links according to a specific link type.","fOperationId":"replaceOutgoing","fDescription":"Sets an asset's provided links according to a specific link type.The request body contains a list of ids of assets that should be linked to the asset. The following rules apply:
  • This operation is only available for active assets with a relationships widget that provide the specified link type.
  • The specified list of assets represents the desired state of provided links according to the specified link type. Assets in the list that were not yet linked to the asset as provided links according to the specified link type, will be assigned. Assets that were linked to the asset as provided links according to the specified link type, but do not appear in the list, will be unlinked.
  • An asset cannot be linked to itself.
  • If any errors occur while (un)linking assets, the response code will still be 200, and the errors will be listed in the response body.


| Permission | Remarks | | --- | --- | | Operator | With write permission for the asset type | | Person | No access |","fPath":"/assetmgmt/import/assets/{assetId}/links/outgoing/{linkTypeId}","fHttpMethod":"PUT","fDeprecated":false,"fResponses":[{"fStatusCode":"200","fDescription":"successful operation","fContents":[{"fMediaType":"application/json","fSchema":{"fName":"responseapplicationjson5056992868","fReferencedName":"#/components/schemas/LinkResults","fExclusiveMaximum":false,"fExclusiveMinimum":false,"fUniqueItems":false,"fRequired":[],"fEnum":[],"fProperties":[],"fOneOf":[],"fNullable":false,"fReadOnly":false,"fWriteOnly":false,"fDeprecated":false,"fGlideType":"object"}}],"fHeaders":[]},{"fStatusCode":"404","fDescription":"Possible causes:
  • The specified asset does not exist.
  • The specified asset is archived.
  • The asset template of the specified asset does not contain a relationships widget, or does not provide the specified link type.
","fContents":[],"fHeaders":[]}],"fParameters":[{"fName":"assetId","fDescription":"The id of the asset whose provided links to set.","fRequired":true,"fDeprecated":false,"fAllowEmptyValue":false,"fAllowReserved":false,"fParameterType":"path","fExplode":false,"fStyle":"simple","fContents":[{"fSchema":{"fName":"assetId1030949043","fExclusiveMaximum":false,"fExclusiveMinimum":false,"fUniqueItems":false,"fRequired":[],"fEnum":[],"fType":"string","fProperties":[],"fOneOf":[],"fFormat":"uuid","fNullable":false,"fReadOnly":false,"fWriteOnly":false,"fDeprecated":false,"fGlideType":"string"}}]},{"fName":"linkTypeId","fDescription":"The id of the link type.","fRequired":true,"fDeprecated":false,"fAllowEmptyValue":false,"fAllowReserved":false,"fParameterType":"path","fExplode":false,"fStyle":"simple","fContents":[{"fSchema":{"fName":"linkTypeId2484799240","fExclusiveMaximum":false,"fExclusiveMinimum":false,"fUniqueItems":false,"fRequired":[],"fEnum":[],"fType":"string","fProperties":[],"fOneOf":[],"fFormat":"uuid","fNullable":false,"fReadOnly":false,"fWriteOnly":false,"fDeprecated":false,"fGlideType":"string"}}]}]}
